title: Balance Temmo Please hes so over powered
body:
Teemo is a very strong champ in the league and i think he needs a few Nerf to fall in line of being fair, His Shrooms need a huge Nerf, Their base damage is to high being 450 at max rank this is a quarter of someones health, not including the AP scaling of 50% it just makes them to strong without oracle in the game anymore u cant fight this.        
         Second his blind yes it is a blinding dart so it should blind for a good amount of time but its ridiculous how long i lasts, 2.5 second at max rank that's just to much where as Quinn's blind is a skill shot and only gets a blind time of 1.5 seconds. Temmo can basically remove an ADC like Lucian or Kog'maw from an entire team fight with one blind. I don't understand why the blind time is so long it should be shorter considering its a lock on ability and not a skill shot. The AP scalling on it is 80% making him able to half health you with one shot. Considering the base damage is 260.
        Third his ability to poke in lane is so high i think his attack range should be lowered to 480 because 500 is just to high he can bully out laners like Riven and Jax.    The ability he has hes just two well rounded as a champion he has range he has poke he has dot effects its just all to much and it makes him two strong.
      Lastly his E i think that it is a well rounded ability except for the AP scaling 70% off your AP lets say a Teemo has 1000 AP 1 auto attack will dead 1170 damage in 4 seconds (Not including the auto attack damage or any items like {{item:3151}} ).
     For my conclusion i think Teemo is out of line and is two strong of a champion i mean a Teemo with 1000 AP will do 950 damage with 1 shroom, 870 damage with 1 auto attack, 1060 damage with 1 Q These damage ratios are To high and he need a proper nerf.{{champion:17}} Here is a video of a temmo Yes he gets feed but watch the first couple minutes and watch the damage (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7wYPhHJPJ0) All Credit goes to this guy for the video (YukalayleeGames)

replies.body: Teemo's AP build already got a huge nerf...  It sounds like you're not actually interested in balance, but would rather see him gutted to the point where he is no longer playable.
Teemo not play able no but hes to strong at the moment he can send a player back to base with 1 shroom late game and there is no fun in that. Temmo can shrrom the map and sit in base and get kills
No.  Teemo used to be able to half health an ADC with his shrooms, but then he was nerfed.  You're exaggerating his strength, or you're fighting a Teemo who has quite a few levels on you.
No im fighting a temmo whos level 18 and were all full build and 1 q did 1300 damage

What, did you have negative MR?  You realize carries are allowed to build defensive items right?  My bet is that Teemo also had a Lichbane, and it was his Q/Auto combo that did the damage, and not his Q alone.

If you're squishy, refuse to build defense, and put yourself in a position where a burst champ can do their thing on you then you pretty much deserve the quick death you found.
Playing a Gp with armour and a spirit Visage and temmo has like 30 Magic pen from boots and Liandris, not including runes and masteries,
Why build armor against AP Teemo?  MR is a nice stat to have against AP top laners, but what you really want in lane is health and damage.  It just sounds like you need to work on your itemization.
i had a sprit visage 2 but other than that i needed damge tank gp ist viable

> [{quoted}](name=Babs2424,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MKUVyLlp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-26T18:23:10.793+0000)
>
> Teemo not play able no but hes to strong at the moment he can send a player back to base with 1 shroom late game and there is no fun in that. Temmo can shrrom the map and sit in base and get kills

What is late game to you? Majority of people have around 1850 HP late game and have decent regeneration. Also, note the point that he has to shroom the map. You never talked about what may happen while he shrooms the map.

> [{quoted}](name=Babs2424,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MKUVyLlp,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-26T18:23:10.793+0000)
>
> Teemo not play able no but hes to strong at the moment he can send a player back to base with 1 shroom late game and there is no fun in that. Temmo can shrrom the map and sit in base and get kills

Not fun =/= overpowered.
Teemo...OP..lololol

Bro - can you show me a build where I can reach 1,000 AP in a typical 5v5 SR?  Teemo's kit is literally designed to be the Anti-ADC... You say Teemo's ULT (that's what his shrooms are) are overpowered, but his ult damage is less than Mages / Assassins / ADC's.. nerf what?

KK 1000 ap coming up Mejais fully stacks Zhonyas, Rabadons,liandris, Ryalias Septer 100+120+120+120+180 = 640 + 40 from baron + runes and masteries so somewhere between 0-60, and finally we multiply it all by dragon buffs and mastaries such as 3% increased damage = 680 * 45% = 986 Remember also u can get boots or go for another ap item making it over 1000 ap ur welcome

> [{quoted}](name=Babs2424,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MKUVyLlp,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2014-12-26T18:27:49.066+0000)
>
> KK 1000 ap coming up Mejais fully stacks Zhonyas, Rabadons,liandris, Ryalias Septer 100+120+120+120+180 = 640 + 40 from baron + runes and masteries so somewhere between 0-60, and finally we multiply it all by dragon buffs and mastaries such as 3% increased damage = 680 * 45% = 986 Remember also u can get boots or go for another ap item making it over 1000 ap ur welcome

So Teemo never died in lane, keeping all his stacks, won every dragon, and baron for your math to work?  If your team is getting that dominated, any champ will be beating you.  Larger problems afoot than Teemo being "OP".
ur not seeing the point lets say temmo got feed he can 1 shot anyone with a dgf Q combo ive seen it happen. hes going to get stacks
All burst champions can kill people with a single combo if they get fed, this is nothing specific to Teemo.
Nerf Teemo's global taunt too pls.

A Teemo who guys for 1000AP will die before he gets into Kog Maw's range...
(Not to mention that within the 4s his DoT takes lategame fights already are over)

Wow, never thought I'd see the day when a player was so bad they thought Teemo was op.

Please uninstall now.
Most annoying champion to play against.. but not OP
Lmao he's annoying as hell, not OP. Play as anything not squishy, then get fed.

Ah but thats where your wrong 1 shrrom can send a player back 2 base on half health late game and what about people who are squisy such as ur jungler, mid, adc what are they going to do to counter this nothing they just get half their health removed instantly and they can try to burst him down but he can just run with his Move Quick and he can place shroom everywhere considering their short CD
Rofl...

teemo is a trash champ and not really overpowered. the only thing is he needs a shroom cap limit instead of unlimited shrooms everywhere. also his blind needs to last like  a second or a half less if its going to do that much dmg. and maybe nerf his shrooms a litle but hes not op really. just can set WAYY too many shrooms. can set shrooms in his base then defend against 5 ppl because minions cant even reach turret
